Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Parsouma the Naked:

Text.Language: Hiten nieu,/ n~te peniwt e#y#u# n~ackut/c abba Parcwma pirefv/s: Po#c# a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers: of our holy and ascetic father: Abba Parsouma the Naked, O Lord grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
